name: Spreadsheet File
semantic_context: Reads and writes data from a spreadsheet file like CSV, XLS, ODS, etc
natural_language_description: 这是 Spreadsheet File 节点。主要用于: Reads and writes data from a spreadsheet file like CSV, XLS, ODS, etc

oldVersionNotice.displayName: New node version available: get the latest version with added features from the nodes panel.
oldVersionNotice.name: oldVersionNotice
oldVersionNotice.natural_language_description: 参数名: New node version available: get the latest version with added features from the nodes panel.

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: fromFile
available_options: Read From File (值: fromFile) - Reads data from a spreadsheet file
Write to File (值: toFile) - Writes the workflow data to a spreadsheet file

binaryPropertyName.name: binaryPropertyName
binaryPropertyName.natural_language_description: 参数名: Put Output File in Field | 提示: The name of the output binary field to put the file in | 默认值: data | (必填项)

fileFormat.name: fileFormat
fileFormat.description: The format of the file to save the data as
fileFormat.natural_language_description: 参数名: File Format | 作用: The format of the file to save the data as | 默认值: xls

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: compression (值: None) - Whether compression will be applied or not
fileName (值: None) - File name to set in binary data. By default will "spreadsheet.<fileFormat>" be used.
headerRow (值: None) - Whether the first row of the file contains the header names
sheetName (值: None) - Name of the sheet to create in the spreadsheet
